labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Greece', 'Pays-Bas', "L'Espagne", 'Énergie', 'Industrie'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Greece', 'Pays-Bas', "L'Espagne", 'Industrie']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Allemagne', "L'Irlande", "L'Espagne", 'Énergie', 'Services de télécommunications'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Allemagne', "L'Irlande", "L'Espagne", 'Énergie']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Grande-Bretagne', 'Greece', "États-Unis d'Amérique", 'Finances', 'Santé'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Grande-Bretagne', 'Greece', "États-Unis d'Amérique"]

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Grande-Bretagne', 'Hong Kong', 'Singapour', 'Énergie', 'Utilitaires'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Greece', 'Hong Kong', 'Norvège', 'Énergie', 'Finances'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Greece', 'Hong Kong', 'Norvège']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['France', 'Allemagne', 'Suède', 'Industrie', 'Biens et services de consommation non cycliques'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['France', 'Allemagne', 'Suède', 'Industrie']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Hong Kong', 'Japon', "États-Unis d'Amérique", 'Énergie', 'ETF'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Hong Kong', 'Japon', "États-Unis d'Amérique", 'Énergie']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Canada', "L'Irlande", "L'Espagne", 'Technologie', 'Services de télécommunications'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Canada', "L'Irlande", "L'Espagne"]

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Norvège', "L'Espagne", "États-Unis d'Amérique", 'ETF', 'Technologie']
